nodes.text: The Grand Imperial Quartet were a band of musicians that played together during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Consisting of two kloo horn players and two strummers, the quartet played on the upper ring of the Vaiken Spacedock during the war, a space station within the Imperial Fleet. The members, three Humans and a Duros, had played on a circular stage behind a bar, and their enlarged images where holographically displayed above their heads.
The Grand Imperial Quartet were created for the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic.
